info.name: Basic 16-bit 32xN bitmap tool
info.description:
a small tool i made to make images easily, each of the 32-bit integer corresponds to a binary counting system style of activating pixels.
b1 adds 1 to the brightness.
b2 adds 2 to the brightness.
b3 adds 4 to the brightness.
b4 adds 8 to the brightness.
